sname

sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3

sinheritDescription
false

icons/script.png
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<p>函数或方法。</p>
<p>如有特殊的函数实现事物，可以注册到本事物的子节点下。</p>
#$@text#$@
  @/@actions
  sname
  actions
  sdescriptors
  xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@actions
  sid
  actions
    @/@actions/@toJavaScriptCode
    sname
    toJavaScriptCode
    sisSynchronized
    false
    sthrowException
    true
    suseOtherAction
    false
    suseOuterJava
    true
    souterClassName
    xworker.html.extjs.FunctionCreator
    smethodName
    toJavaScriptCode
    sdisableGlobalContext
    false
    sdescriptors
    xworker.lang.actions.JavaAction
    sid
    toJavaScriptCode
    @/@actions/@toHtml
    sname
    toHtml
    sdescriptors
    xworker.lang.actions.Actions/@NOOP
    sth_createIndex
    false
    sth_mark
    false
    sid
    toHtml
  @/@name

  @/@useCode

  sreadOnly

  sdefault

  sinheritDescription

  sdescription
  <p>Function的代码是否是子节点提供的，如果选择false，那么Function的代码是通属性code生成的。</p>
  svalidateAllowBlank
  true
  LvalidateOnBlur

  LallowDecimals

  LallowNegative

  @/@code
  sname

  sinputtype
  codeEditor
  sshowLabel

  scolspan

  smodifier

  sinputattrs
  codeName=js codeType=js wrap=false fillBoth=true cols= rows=
  sreadOnly
  false
  sinheritDescription
  false
  svalidateAllowBlank
  true
  LvalidateOnBlur
  false
  LallowDecimals
  false
  LallowNegative
  false
  snotXmlAttribute
  false
  sdescriptors
  xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
  sid
  code
  @/@Code
  sname
  Code
  sdescriptors
  xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@thing
  smany
  true
  seditCols
  2
  sinitialization
  false
  smodifier
  public
  sinheritDescription
  false
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<p>直接插入一段代码。</p>
<p>可以包含SubCode，SubCode可以嵌入到代码中，比如代码：</p>
<p>if(btn == 'ok'){<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ${okSubCode}<br />
}</p>
<p>其中okSubCode是名称为okSubCode的SubCode生成代码。</p>
<p>当有SubCode时使用Freemarker模板处理代码，否则不处理。在做事物模板时请注意。</p>
#$@text#$@
  sth_createIndex
  false
  sth_mark
  false
  sid
  Code
    @/@Code/@actions
    sname
    actions
    sdescriptors
    xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute/@actions
    sth_createIndex
    false
    sid
    actions
      @/@Code/@actions/@toJavaScriptCode
      sname
      toJavaScriptCode
      sisSynchronized
      false
      sthrowException

      suseOtherAction
      false
      suseOuterJava
      true
      souterClassName
      xworker.html.extjs.FunctionCreator
      smethodName
      codeToJavaScriptCode
      sdisableGlobalContext

      sattributeTemplate
      false
      sinterpretationType
      Action
      svarScope

      sdescriptors
      xworker.lang.actions.JavaAction
